thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Ping An Insurance Group Involving 1.26 Bln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Ping An Insurance Group Involving 1.26 Bln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-shanghai exchange filing shows block trade of ping an insurance group involving 1.26 bln yuan

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Shanghai Stock Exchange :
* FILING SHOWS BLOCK TRADE OF PING AN INSURANCE GROUP CO OF CHINA LTD'S 20 MILLION SHARES INVOLVING 1.26 BILLION YUAN ($200.12 million) ON FEB 9 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2yJZikT Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2961 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
